title: That's farming
creator_credit: Michael Burston, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: For Michael Burston, leaving the city and taking up farming full time was a gradual process, and one not without obstacles. From virulent weeds to natural disasters, Burston was determined to pull through.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Burston, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
